author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 40 bicycles meant for distribution to students were seized by election officials here on Wednesday.

DMK cadre in Periyamanali, near Tiruchengode, noticed a van entering the Government Higher Secondary School in Ulagappam Palayam and bicycles being unloaded.

The driver told the cadre that over 100 bicycles are repaired and 40 belonging to the school are unloaded. As many as 18 bicycles are unloaded while 22 bicycles are found in the vehicle. DMK cadre informed the flying squad who rushed to the spot and seized the bicycles. The remaining bicycles and the vehicle were also seized by the officials.
title: Bicycles seized in Tiruchengode
